title: Multipage Valentine-themed personal website with editable gallery, messages, timeline, and surprises

requirements.text: Create a fully responsive multipage Valentine-themed personal website with the following pages: Home, “Our Memories” (Photo Gallery), Love Messages, Timeline, Interactive Surprise, and Final Dedication.

quotes: Create a multipage Valentine themed personal website… Required Pages & Sections: Home Page… Photo Gallery… Love Messages Page… Timeline Page… Interactive Surprise Page… Final Dedication Page

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation exists to access all required pages on both mobile and desktop.
Layout is fully responsive (no horizontal scroll on common phone widths) and remains readable on large screens.
All user-facing text is in English.

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive romantic visual theme across all pages: soft pastel palette (pink, beige, lavender, cream, rose gold), cute-but-classy styling, elegant romantic typography, and smooth animations/transitions that feel subtle and emotional.

quotes: Soft pastel color palette (pink, beige, lavender, cream, rose gold). Cute but classy aesthetic. Smooth animations and transitions. Elegant romantic fonts.

acceptanceCriteria: A consistent color system (including rose-gold accents) is used across components and pages.
Animations/transitions are present on page load and key interactions, and are subtle (no distracting motion).
Typography uses romantic/elegant fonts (with sensible fallbacks) and remains accessible/readable.

requirements.text: Implement the Home page with: (1) a romantic welcome headline (e.g., “For My Special One”), (2) a hero section with an image background, and (3) subtle heart/love animations (e.g., floating hearts, shimmer, or gentle particle hearts).

quotes: Home Page Romantic welcome message (e.g., ‘For My Special One’). Beautiful hero section with image background. Subtle heart or love animations.

acceptanceCriteria: Home page shows a hero section with a background image and an English romantic welcome message.
At least one subtle heart/love animation is visible on the Home page.
Animations remain performant on mobile (no obvious jank during scrolling).

requirements.text: Build the “Our Memories” Photo Gallery page featuring a slideshow/carousel with smooth animated transitions, supporting multiple photos and showing a caption under each photo.

quotes: Photo Gallery – “Our Memories” Slideshow or carousel gallery. Ability to upload multiple personal photos. Captions under each picture. Smooth animated transitions.

acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays photos in a carousel/slideshow with previous/next controls and smooth transitions.
Each photo displays a caption beneath it.
The gallery works on touch devices (swipe or tap controls).

requirements.text: Create the Love Messages page with multiple message cards/envelopes; each message is click-to-open (closed preview state → opened full note), and supports long personal messages with comfortable reading layout.

quotes: Love Messages Page Multiple message cards or envelopes. Click-to-open style notes. Space to add long personal messages.

acceptanceCriteria: Messages appear as multiple cards/envelopes in a grid/list appropriate for screen size.
Clicking/tapping a message toggles open/close with an animation.
Long messages are scrollable/expandable and remain readable on mobile.

requirements.text: Create the Timeline page showing a journey timeline of milestones (important dates), with each milestone supporting a date, title, description, and optional photo; include interactive affordances (expand/collapse or step-by-step browsing) while keeping the page romantic and elegant.

quotes: Timeline Page A journey timeline with important dates. Option to add photos and descriptions for each milestone.

acceptanceCriteria: Timeline renders a chronological list of milestones with date and description visible.
Each milestone can optionally show a photo.
Timeline is usable on mobile (no cramped layout; milestones stack vertically).

requirements.text: Implement the Interactive Surprise page with: (1) a “surprise” button that triggers a romantic reveal (message/animation), (2) a small love quiz (multiple questions with results), (3) flip cards, and (4) heart animations on clicks/taps within the page.

quotes: Interactive Surprise Page Fun interactive elements like: A surprise button Love quiz Flip cards Heart animations on clicks

acceptanceCriteria: Surprise button triggers a visible reveal interaction (text and/or animation).
Quiz supports at least 3 questions, tracks answers, and shows a result/summary at the end.
Flip cards animate between front/back states on click/tap.
Clicking/tapping in designated areas triggers heart animations.

requirements.text: Implement the Final Dedication page with a closing love note and a personal signature section (name/sign-off), styled consistently with the overall theme.

quotes: Final Dedication Page A closing love note. Personal signature section.

acceptanceCriteria: Final Dedication page includes a closing note area and a signature/sign-off area.
Typography and spacing make the note feel like a final, emotional dedication.
Page remains fully responsive.

requirements.text: Provide an easy in-app editing experience to update photos, captions, memories, timeline milestones, and love letters/messages, including drag-and-drop interactions where appropriate (e.g., reordering gallery items and message cards).

quotes: Functional Requirements Easy drag-and-drop editing. Ability for me to update photos and memories and letter

acceptanceCriteria: There is a clearly discoverable “Edit” mode/page in the UI for managing content.
Gallery items can be added/removed and reordered via drag-and-drop; captions are editable.
Love messages can be added/removed and reordered via drag-and-drop; message text supports long content editing.
Timeline milestones can be added/edited/removed and reordered; each milestone supports date/title/description and optional photo.
Edits persist across page reloads (stored in the canister backend).

requirements.text: Implement backend persistence APIs in the single Motoko main actor to store and retrieve all editable content: gallery items (image + caption + ordering), love messages (title/preview + full text + ordering), timeline milestones (date/title/description/photo + ordering), Home/Final Dedication text fields, and Interactive Surprise page configuration (quiz questions/results and flip card content).

quotes: Ability for me to update photos and memories and letter

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes query/update methods to read/write all content types required by the pages.
Frontend uses the backend APIs to load content on page load and to save edits from the editor UI.
Data remains available after refresh and canister redeploy (stable persistence as appropriate for the template).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).

Do not edit files in frontend immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui (compose these instead).
Use React + TypeScript with Tailwind, shadcn/ui composition, and React Query for data fetching/caching.
nonGoals: Third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is allowed if authentication is needed).
Real-time chat, push notifications, or WebSocket-based features.
External database integrations (must store data in the canister).

required: Pastel romantic hero background with soft bokeh and subtle heart shapes (valentine-hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Seamless pastel heart pattern background, minimal and elegant (valentine-heart-pattern.dim_1024x1024.png)
Rose-gold foil style divider/ornament line, elegant flourish (rose-gold-divider.dim_1600x200.png)
Cute classy envelope illustration, minimal vector-like style (love-envelope-icon.dim_512x512.png)
